website_summaries.verdict: Guardzilla makes a fine budget webcam, but there are free app solutions like Manything, Presence and Salient Eye that do even more for less.
pros: At just $100, Guardzilla is significantly less expensive than many standalone DIY security cameras
You can use a microSD card to store video footage locally
cons: Guardzilla's motion alerts are sporadic at best, making it an unreliable security device

It snaps photos when it detects motion rather than video (unless you buy a microSD card and even if you do, you'll have to remove the card to view recordings since there's no built-in video-clip-viewing feature on the app)

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE CAMERAS.  COMPANY IS OUT OF BUSINESS
customer_reviews.text: Guardzilla has closed it's doors and not supporting their products. The cameras will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Save ur money
customer_reviews.text: Two hours on phone with support. My wifi and router is new. They kept blaming everything. Else why this wouldn't connect. Hit n miss. Then it connects after deleting app. And re doing it. Spend the extra money on another. To many flaws on this. Set up stinks and falsely advertised. U have to use two wifis. There's and urs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, bad Guardzilla customer service
customer_reviews.text: The cameras only worked for a short time, I had to constantly reset them, however, the wifi connect didn't show up on my phone so I couldn't connect them. I called Guardzilla repeatedly just to be placed on hold. I was on hold for an hour & 25 minutes, they never answered. Bad product, bad Guardzilla customer service, or should I say their non customer service is lousy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these. For some reason this camera does whatever it wants. This company will more than likely not be around much longer. Move along. Don't waste your money. Too many issues.
customer_reviews.author: Prepared Guy

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable. Too bad.
customer_reviews.text: Not reliable . Sometimes it work then most of the time it does not . It goes offline. I have emailed customer service and did all what they suggested . Still works the same . I have a new I phone 5. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: anthony  hall

customer_reviews.title: It’s quite useful and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: It’s quite useful and user friendly. I bought the wrong size sd card for recording photos but apparently they let you save two days worth of photos in the cloud, so I have yet to need to buy a new sd card for it. Very intuitive and easy to figure out. Lots of great features including talking through the device remotely and viewing a live feed to name just a few.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dushek

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time!!
customer_reviews.text: Not very good instructions on set up. Once I was able to get it to work it was not a great picture. After getting a new WIFI router it was impossible to reconnect the camera. I followed all the steps on Guardzilla's website but nothing worked. I contacted the company several times and they have never responded. Would never buy anything from Guardzilla ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Carey

customer_reviews.title: Guardzilla ( not )
customer_reviews.text: takes along time to get any tech support even with an appointment. I wasted so much time trying to get help, I could have have another system installed in my home. only worked 3 months
customer_reviews.author: James Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. Unit worked 60 days and is now dead. And of course they have a 30 day warranty. $100 for 60 days - what a waste!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Company closed doors
customer_reviews.text: The company closed its doors so my Guardzilla no longer works
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Bandwidth Hog
customer_reviews.text: Hard to recommend this camera. It's very basic to start with and has a major issue using bandwidth. Even if you are not subscribed to their web service the camera is uploading the video stream to somewhere. Even if you discount the privacy issue this could bring up, it is chewing away at your bandwidth allowance. If you are on a capped plan or pay more at a certain bandwidth point, this camera is wasting a large amount of bandwidth for no reason. If you have a slower upload speed on your connection, it can impact your overall speed to a noticeable extent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J.

customer_reviews.title: ... be reset too many times and resetting is not easy, I would love to return both cameras but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these cameras and have to be reset too many times and resetting is not easy, I would love to return both cameras but can not find a phone number for amazon, thks

Not exactly what I was hoping for.

customer_reviews.title: Handy on-the-fly monitor with security options.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, mainly to use as monitors and intercoms for my kids while I'm away. They both work really well. I was surprised by how easy it was to set them up. The video quality is decent and the streaming video works well. The recorded video option is nice, as well. The app is a little unstable at times on my android, but killing it and re-starting clears up the problem.

customer_reviews.title: We are so pleased with how wonderful this item is
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with how wonderful this item is. It took very little time to set up my phone, and a few minutes to connect my husbands. We will be buying a second unit for our family room downstairs. Does everything described.

customer_reviews.title: A very good product.
customer_reviews.text: A very good security camera. I've bought two. I had return one because of problem connecting to wifii, but received a replacement quickly and without questions. The support team is exceptionally informed and very helpful. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Too few notifications.
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great but what they don't tell you is the number of alerts you get in a month is limited. If you have multiple cameras like we do in the first week or two of the month we hit our maximum alerts. Then none of the cameras send any alerts it is a good system just very disappointed in how few alerts you get.

customer_reviews.title: 2X2L...calling CQ...is anyone out there?

Tried calling their tech support number but, even though I called during the support hours on their website and waited 40 minutes, no one ever picked up after being deposited in the "wait for an agent" queue. The FAQs on their website cover nothing related to this symptom so, presumably, it was defective. (Yes, I even reset the unit four times using the instructions in the FAQs.) RMA'd back to Amazon.

customer_reviews.text: Randomly decides when it wants to text and take pictures due to movement. Even when it does detect motion in time, I can sit in the room for 20-30 seconds and the pictures it takes will not capture me in the pictures. My internet is high speed and doesn't fail so that's not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all in one
customer_reviews.text: Very limited.... no panning, alarm low sound, 2 way voice volume low, no zoom or quality picture. All in one does not mean it is both indoor and outdoor. Since they have an indoor and outdoor you would think all in one means both... nope! Not satisfied at all with product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra&Joann

customer_reviews.title: Guardzilla is simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I heard about Guardzilla on a C-net review and thought I would give it a try. It has proved to be a clever device to monitor my home while at work. Installation was a breeze and I was up and running quickly. I was so satisfied wirh Guardzilla that I bought a second unit to cover another area of my home. The app works well with both my iPhone and IPad.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes finicky but the best for the price
customer_reviews.text: This thing works for what you need. Especially if you need local 24/7 video recording. Sometimes finicky but the best for the price. Customer service is amazing. That's worth it alone. Happy security-ing
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are new at being snow birds and love to be able to check our home while we are away. We looked at a lot of options, but none were this reasonably priced and requiring no additional fees for monitoring, etc. Also very easy to set up and use. I have two cameras .that can be accessed from both my phone and my husbands. Have had a few false motion detections, which makes it even better to see what is happening in your home. Also had to bug the dogs a bit before we left which is hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this product. Not only is it easy to set-up, customer service quickly assisted me when I had a phone connection issue. I love the fact that I can monitor my house on my iphone and ipad. First I purchased one for my NY home, then my FL home. Both are visible in either state.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it works, but I have had to factory reset it a few times. The last time the LED light just started blinking green and I did not know why. You really do have to take your time when you set it t up. I really like not having to pay a security co every month too!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Jurgens

customer_reviews.title: A good little monitor
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to set up without instructions. It works well. It seems to be a good monitor. The alarm feature should be a variable or warble tone. I don't hear that single frequency.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great device for my needs. Once in awhile the auto-arm doesn't turn off when I come home. Not a problem. Cannot ask for anything more for this price! I have a small apartment so one does the job! The only thing that would make this even better? Battery Back-up if power goes out..

product_meta.title: Guardzilla GZ502B All-In-One Video Security System (Black)
product_meta.description: Guardzilla is an all in one home security system. Simply plug in and sync to your wifi, Guardzilla's app is highly customizable allowing the owner to use the device in a number of ways. Guardzilla's camera will show a live feed of what it sees, but once armed, will send you notifications should its motion detection sense a disturbance. Other feature benefits include 100dB siren, infared night vision, pet immunity, auto arming and disarming, and two way audio just to name a few. For indoor use only.
feature_bullets: Discreet surveillance, live video monitoring from your smartphone. For indoor use only
Smartphone alerts via email text or push notification upon motion detection
Infrared night vision for 24x7 monitoring and security. Communicate through the device with 2 way audio
** VERY IMPORTANT** Please Note: Kindly refer the Instructional Video & the User Manual before use which is very essential.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.6 out of 5 stars376 ratings2.6 out of 5 stars
